text: @RahulGandhi @RahulGandhi @ManojMehtamm What a joke. This is what we are brought to by ten percenters!! @CIPE_ACGC @PMOIndia Humble request..probably we do not need to eradicate corruption. At least till we pass #COVID19 we can do without it. #SocialDistance & #Contacttrace corrupt
